title: How to Open the Crown Chakra

steps.title: Your spiritual connection starts with the earth.
steps.content: Your spiritual connection starts with the earth. Since the crown chakra represents your spiritual connection, what better way to open it than by being in nature? Adding daily outdoor walks to your routine or stepping out into the sun when you feel stressed can help balance your crown chakra. [1] X Research source The weather doesn’t always work in our favor, and that’s okay! Like nature, we have mood swings, and it’s all about feeling them out. Dance in the rain, jump through the snow, or skip against the wind. Be mindful of your surroundings and enjoy what this world has to offer.

steps.title: The crown chakra comes down to one thing and one thing only:
steps.content: The crown chakra comes down to one thing and one thing only: you. Your connection with your mind, body, and spirit is essential to opening this chakra, so sit with yourself and give yourself time to relax. [2] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. Turn off all background noises like your TV or music, and find a quiet place to rest. Set aside 10 to 20 minutes each day to be still and do nothing. [3] X Research source Unlike other chakras, the crown chakra prefers silence. Rather than repeating a mantra to yourself, explore what happens when you are completely and utterly silent.

steps.title: What you say to yourself has great power.
steps.content: What you say to yourself has great power. With the crown chakra being the gateway to your spirituality and thoughts in general, the words you think can make a huge impact. Remind yourself that you are powerful, intelligent, and creative with these affirmations: “I am at peace.” “I trust my intuition.” “I know my own voice.” “I am connected to the universe.” “I am a beautiful creation and create beautiful things.”

steps.title: Purple is connected to the crown chakra and can help move energy.
steps.content: Purple is connected to the crown chakra and can help move energy. The crown chakra’s energy is symbolized by purple. So, put on a purple outfit, slap on some purple-tinted glasses, or watch a video of purple visuals. While this color surrounds you, think about your spirituality. [4] X Research source Ask yourself questions like: What is my purpose? How am I working with the universe? There’s no right or wrong way to do this—just have fun!

steps.title: Mushrooms, garlic, and coconut are some "power" foods you can try.
steps.content: Mushrooms, garlic, and coconut are some "power" foods you can try. Ginger, onion, and lychee also represent strength. Taking a few bites of these each day may help you open your crown chakra. [5] X Research source What you put into your body matters as you absorb the energy you eat. In spiritual traditions, fasting is used to open the crown chakra. Some say pausing your food intake can help boost your energy and clear your mind. This method isn’t for everyone, so listen to your body and do what’s best for you.

steps.title: A focused breath can help energize your crown chakra.
steps.content: A focused breath can help energize your crown chakra. Pranayama is the practice of focused breathing in yoga. [6] X Expert Source Karina Menali, L.Ac., DACM, Dipl. OM Licensed Acupuncturist & Diplomate of Oriental Medicine Expert Interview. 25 August 2021. A form of this practice called Nadi Shodhan, or alternate nostril breathing, can help relieve tension and open your crown chakra. All you have to do is close your eyes and follow these steps: [7] X Research source Place your right thumb on your right nostril. Breathe in through your left nostril. Hold your breath, and move your thumb away from your nostril. Place your right ring finger on your left nostril and breathe out. Repeat these steps, alternating which nostril you cover and breathe through, until you feel relaxed.

steps.title: Open the gateway to your spirituality by silencing the mind.
steps.content: Open the gateway to your spirituality by silencing the mind. The hustle and bustle of today’s culture can easily get in the way of our spiritual journey. Meditation is a great tool you can use to reconnect with your mind, body, and spirit, all in the comfort of your own home. [8] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. [9] X Expert Source Karina Menali, L.Ac., DACM, Dipl. OM Licensed Acupuncturist & Diplomate of Oriental Medicine Expert Interview. 25 August 2021. Follow this meditation guide to open your crown chakra: [10] X Research source Find a quiet spot and sit in a comfortable position. Close your eyes and focus on your inhales and exhales. When you feel your breaths get deeper, focus your attention on the top of your head. Imagine a purple ray of light entering your body through your head. With each inhale, the purple light grows and radiates through your body. With each exhale, the light leaves your body. Repeat this until you feel at peace.

steps.title: Yoga is a great way to balance and channel the crown chakra’s energy.
steps.content: Yoga is a great way to balance and channel the crown chakra’s energy. The crown chakra, being on the top of your head, can be opened with inversion and balancing poses. [11] X Expert Source Karina Menali, L.Ac., DACM, Dipl. OM Licensed Acupuncturist & Diplomate of Oriental Medicine Expert Interview. 25 August 2021. Inversions help energy flow to the top of your head right to your crown chakra, and balancing poses help focus your mind inward. Here are some poses you can try: [12] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Modified downward dog Lotus Tree Eagle Rabbit Headstand

steps.title: Think of mudras like yoga for the hands.
steps.content: Think of mudras like yoga for the hands. These small hand movements can help energize and open your chakras. To do the crown chakra’s mudra, hold your hands out in front of your stomach. Interlace your fingers and point your pinkies up. Hold this pose for at least 2 minutes, keeping your breathes steady and full. You can do this mudra when you feel anxious to help reconnect with yourself and the universe. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Use sandalwood or lotus to open your crown chakra.
steps.content: Use sandalwood or lotus to open your crown chakra. Scents can be a great way to reconnect with your spirit. Put an equal amount of these oils in a diffuser and keep it close to you while working, meditating, or even sleeping. The calming and earthy smells can help open your spiritual mind. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Purple crystals like amethyst and lepidolite can help cleanse your spirit.
steps.content: Purple crystals like amethyst and lepidolite can help cleanse your spirit. [15] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. Crystals store and release energy, making them great tools to use when it comes to opening your chakras. Simply lay down and place these crystal on the top of your forehead, or hold it in your hands while meditating. You can do this when you’re feeling stressed, or start a weekly ritual to keep your crown chakra open. [16] X Research source
